interest: Arabic language  and literature through culture; Gender and the impact of Islamic rules  on women’s participation in the public sphere; Arabic calligraphy and  gender bias; Arabic media and the Iraqi transition to democracy; Gender  disparities and the imbalance of rights and their significance in the  Arab world.
